= Ubuntu Server Setup =

* [ ] Ubuntu Server Setup
    - [ ] Create a droplet/iso
    * [ ] SSH
        - [ ] create ssh keys if you dont have:
        - [ ] type this in shell =>
        - ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@example.com"
        - [ ] add linux distro
        - [ ] upload public key to server
    * [ ] Add superuser
        - [ ] adduser pak11273
        - [ ] usermod -aG sudo pak11273
        - [ ] copy public key
        - [ ] login as root and su pak11273
        - [ ] mkdir ~/.ssh
        - [ ] chmod 700 ~/.ssh
        - [ ] vim ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
        - [ ] paste public key
        - [ ] exit
